root.msg:connectionFailure:
Lost connection while resolving the next action.

Check whether you're connected to the network and try again.
root.msg:FORCE_SET_ASSIGNED: User already has an open set assigned.
root.PAGE_ACTION:resolveAction:title: Enter a card ID to resolve the next action
root.empty: No plan for the specified filters.
root.prop:name: Product name
root.settings:planning:ignorePsStatus:help: Orders with one of the following statuses will be ignored during creation of a new set.
root.settings:planning:psPickupStatus:help: Started set will be ready for pickup by the paint-shop only if all painted orders have one of the following paint-shop statuses.
root.settings:planning:psPickupReadyFuncs:hel: Started set will be ready for pickup by the paint-shop only if the following functions completed pickup in all of the set's painted orders.
root.settings:planning:groupExtraItems:help: If quantity of an order in the first/last group of a given line is lower or equal to the specified value, then that group will be merged with the next/previous group.
root.settings:planning:ignoredMrps:help: Orders with one of the following MRP won't show up on the pickup list.
root.settings:planning:enabledMrps:help: Only orders with one of the following MRP will be taken into account when a new set is being created.
root.settings:planning:maxSetSize: Maximum number of orders in a set
root.settings:planning:minSetDuration:help: Set duration cannot exceed the specified number of minutes to be extended by an order that exceeds the Order group duration.
root.settings:planning:maxSetDuration:help: Set duration cannot exceed the specified number of minutes.
root.settings:planning:maxSetDifference:help: Set creation will stop, if the difference between the start time of the next potential order to the finish time of the set's last order is greater than the specified number of minutes.
root.settings:planning:pendingOnly:help: If the option is enabled, only pending orders will be used to calculate the Maximum set time difference.
root.settings:planning:minPickupDowntime:help: Minimum time that has to pass between an end of the last pickup and a start of the new pickup to register a downtime.
root.settings:planning:maxPickupDowntime:help: If a duration of the potential downtime is greater than the specified value, the downtime is not saved.
root.settings:planning:maxSetsPerLine: Maximum number of completed sets per line
root.settings:planning:minTimeForDelivery:hel: Carts for lines which have less available time than the specified value will be marked as awaiting delivery.
root.settings:planning:lateDeliveryTime:help: Carts for lines which have less available time than the specified value will have a red background.
root.settings:planning:minDeliveryDowntime:he: Minimum time that has to pass between an end of the last delivery and a start of the new delivery to register a downtime.
root.settings:planning:maxDeliveryDowntime:he: If a duration of the potential downtime is greater than the specified value, the downtime is not saved.
root.settings:planning:maxSetCartsPerDelivery: Maximum number of FIFO carts that can be assigned for delivery to a user at once.
root.settings:planning:maxDeliveryStartTime:h: Maximum minutes from now to the planned order start time to mark a cart as pending delivery, if its line is currently not working.
root.settings:planning:availableTimeThreshold: When picking a line during creation of a new set, the sum of picked up time and delivered time will be changed to 0, if it's less than the specified number of minutes.
